HOME.SLOGAN_TEXT: We are strongly committed to make the organization of team events like trainings or helper jobs as simple as possible without any unnecessary features. This with a free web based and multi device optimized platform accessible anywhere anytime.

ADV1.TITLE: commitments & cancellations
ADV1.TEXT: Create participation or cancellation events and enter a maximum and/or a mininum of needed members if you want to control the range of people you need per event.

ADV2.TITLE: manage your helper jobs
ADV2.TEXT: Many clubs have troubles organizing the many volunteer work. team.center makes it easy to manage them. The helping people can pick the jobs they want by themselfes.

ADV3.TITLE: one click
ADV3.TEXT: As so often the time is rare. With team.center you can join or cancle an event with only one click. We designed team.center with a strong focus of minimazing clicks.

ADV4.TITLE: be a member of several teams
ADV4.TEXT: In the event overview you will see all the events in which you are included as a team member. You have all your team events displayed in one centralized place.

ADV5.TITLE: use mail notifications
ADV5.TEXT: While creating an event, the admin can decide if the event should be created with automatic mail reminders, indicating how many days before the event the reminder will be sent.

ADV6.TITLE: team statistics & reporting
ADV6.TEXT: Each team member has fully transparency about the number participating or remaining members of his team mates. With this information for example club members will remember themselfes automacitally for picking a helper job or to cancle a training session.

ACTIVATION.ALREADY_ACTIVATED: You're mail has already been activated
ACTIVATION.ACTIVATION_SUCCESS: Your mail has been activated successfully

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.MESSAGE_404: Woops, the page you're looking for isn't there!

SECTION1.TITLE: About
SECTION1.TEXT1: With love and passion from Zurich - team.center is a privately sponsered web project out of Switzerland. team.center is currently in Beta status and we are constantly improving the user experiance - day by day. We are strongly committed to make the organization of team events as simple as possible without any unnecessary features. This with a free web based and multi device optimized platform accessible anywhere anytime.
SECTION1.TEXT2: - It's free and always will be -
SECTION1.TEXT3: Behind team.center works a small team, all of us involved in organizing team and sport events ourselfs as team managers and board members of local clubs. We understand your needs!
SECTION1.TEXT4: - Use your precious time to train and play instead of using it to organize -
SECTION1.TEXT5: Please let us know what kind of additional functionalities you require or have always dreamed of. We are going to make them happen if there is a common need. In other words: team.center of tomorrow will be evovling by the users and their needs - your needs. Please give us your feedback.
SECTION1.TEXT6: We made the first step and took action to make teams be easly organized. If you like our idea or share our excitement, support us by buying us a coffee:
SECTION1.TEXT7: Like and follow us on facebook:

SECTION2.TITLE: Upcoming features
SECTION2.TEXT1: add a comment to cancellations or participations

SECTION3.TITLE: How to support us?
SECTION3.TEXT: You can support our project with buing us a coffee or even more :)
SECTION3.TEXT2: We would highly appreciate liking us on Facebook this way we can keep you members informed about our progress.

SECTION4.TITLE: What is next?
SECTION4.TEXT: Excel (CSV) Upload function to create multiple events and members per one click
SECTION4.TEXT2: Ability for Admins to enable "Event log" view for the members
SECTION4.TEXT3: Google maps for location entires - Other languages - Mobile Apps (Android & iOS)
SECTION4.TEXT4: We are grateful for feedbacks, or recommondations for new features. Please just use our contact form
